title: The Great Art of Life is Sensation
description: alternate cover edition of ISBN:139780991552702The Risk of Being Tamed SeriesThe Great Art of Life is Sensation For the first time in her life, headstrong Ashton Rhodes was not in control. She had all but given up on being properly dominated. Her independent attitude left most men feeling they had taken on more than they could handle.Hendrix Larson however, showed no sign of intimidation when he thrust himself into her life. Dismissing her apprehension, Ashton allowed herself to be lead into a world of absinthe and secret clubs where anything was possible. She was finally submitting to the unknown and was certain of nothing more than one simple fact; Hendrix Larson was not to be disobeyed.
author: Ashton Rhodes
